name: SRIJANI SOCIETY FOR PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES

address: JOKA SRIJANI PARK  M G ROAD

briefDescription: Thus there is a tremendous need to address these issues so that PWDs can overcome the barriers and break the negative social attitude, fight the discrimination for equal opportunities and live a better quality of life with due respect and dignity.Looking at these needs SRIJANI……..Srijani Society for People With Disabilities formed in the year 2006 by some passionable professional social workers by their own effort from remote area of SUNDARBANsIt is also an initiative of Grass Root Level Community Based Organizations to support Persons with Disabilities to voice their rights and promote equal opportunity, build up their capacity, raise their self-confidence and self esteem through education and skill, training, motivate them to partic

address: JOKA SRIJANI PARK M G ROAD
